Changelog¶

1.0 beta¶

  • Completed API documentation.
  • Bug fix

1.0 alpha¶

Major revision

  • Added novel feature type: PlotFeature, BarPlotFeature TextSequence
  • Added colorbars
  • Can now use sequence as X tick labels
  • Improved track and figure positioning
  • Added per-letter annotation support
  • Added url in SVG as alternative to HTML maps
  • Added legend for tracks
  • Many bug fix and minor improvements

0.3 (released)¶

  • changed namespace to biograpy
  • Public release

0.2 (unreleased)¶

  • boxes and imagemap [mauro]

0.1 (unreleased)¶

  • Initial draft
